Summary: The package provides a collection of illustrative Python examples covering asynchronous programming, sorting algorithms, recursion, gradient descent, logging integration with VizTracer, game state modeling for Monte Carlo Tree Search, multiprocessing pool utilities, and multithreading wrapper, each demonstrating specific concepts and utilities.

Business intent: To serve as educational reference code for developers learning various programming techniques (asyncio, algorithms, machine learning optimization, logging/tracing, concurrency, game AI) and to provide ready-to-use snippets that can be adapted for teaching, prototyping, or benchmarking.

Keywords: ["asyncio", "sorting algorithms", "heap sort", "merge sort", "quick sort", "tracing", "recursive fibonacci", "gradient descent", "machine learning", "cost function", "logging", "VizTracer", "Monte Carlo Tree Search", "tic-tac-toe", "game state", "multiprocessing", "process pool", "multithreading", "concurrency", "example code", "educational"].

Return JSON.
